name: Powershell
tagline: A collection of my PowerShell scripts
body:
#Welcome
Welcome to my PowerShell scripting site. Here you will find samples and examples of my PowerShell scripts, functions, modules and miscellany related to PowerShell.

>Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
>-Brian Kernighan
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
